name: Old-Fashioned Shortcake
author: Jennifer Kuchnicki Merzlicker
summary: This is a fabulous old-fashioned recipe given to me by a friend. It was her mother's recipe and it is the best shortcake.  It sops up all the juice and the touch of nutmeg sends it over the top. My very favorite recipe for strawberry shortcake!
ingredients: ¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg, or to taste
directions: Preheat an oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Sift flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and nutmeg in a large bowl
Cut in butter with a knife or pastry blender until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs
Beat egg and milk in another bowl; stir into flour mixture until batter is just blended
Spread batter in the prepared baking pan
Bake in preheated oven until golden, about 15 minutes
Cool in the pan for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack
